name: Jesus of Nazareth
role: Religious teacher and founder of Christianity
what_did:
Jesus taught about love, forgiveness, and the Kingdom of God.
He gathered followers, performed healings, and spoke in parables.
He was crucified by Roman authorities and Christians believe he rose from the dead three days later.
why_matters:
